title.narrative: Assistance Technique : Dialogue national sur les nouveaux rôles constitutionnels de la Société Civile

description.narrative: Les principaux bénéficiaires du projet sont: le Gouvernement et la Société Civile Marocaine.
The main beneficiaries of the project are: the Government and the Moroccan Civil Society.
L’objectif recherché à travers cet appui est la consultation de l’ensemble des acteurs de la société civile afin d’élaborer une politique de consultation publique.
The objective sought through this support is the consultation of all the actors of the civil society in order to develop a public consultation policy.

The present project concerns the technical assistance for the national dialogue on the new constitutional roles of civil society. Indeed, on ministerial decision, and according to the provisions of the new constitution within the framework of the activation of the participative democracy, a national dialogue is started. This project has the support of the African Development Bank through a donation from the funds of countries in transition of 335,200 euros. This support should help put in place legislation that regulates the involvement of civil society in the public sphere, in order to devote participatory democracy.

participating-org.narrative: Multi donor Trust Fund for Countries in Transition
